title: Gatech CS 1301 Computing in Python I
Gatech CS 1301 Computing in Python I

content: Programming Vocabulary Code: Commands given to a computer in order to perform a task. Line of code: A single command. Program: A collection of lines of code that serve one or more overall functions. Input (files, user input, websites) 👉 code 👉 output (files, screen, sound) Compile: Reading over code and looking for errors. (proofreading by compilers) Run: When the program is actually executed.
